allow: Bash(powershell -Command "Get-Process -Name node -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object Id, ProcessName")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: 10x-Team Outreach System

Multi-platform outreach automation with visual workflow canvas for Claude Code.

Features:
- Visual workflow canvas \(TLDraw\) on localhost:3000
- 13 skills for LinkedIn, Twitter, Instagram, Gmail automation
- Drag-to-connect node interface
- Auto-save and PNG/SVG export
- Workflow simulation and preview
- curl/PowerShell one-line installers
- Professional rate limiting and touch limits

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update repo paths to official account

Updated all install scripts and documentation to use:
https://github.com/Anit-1to10x/10x-outreach-skill

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add comprehensive README with visual canvas docs

- Complete installation guide \(curl/PowerShell one-liners\)
- Visual workflow canvas documentation
- All 13 skills and commands documented
- Architecture diagram
- Rate limiting and safety features
- Troubleshooting guide

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Claude Code integration for visual workflow creation

Canvas API:
- POST /api/canvas/workflow - Create complete workflows
- POST /api/canvas/command - Send individual commands
- GET /api/canvas/commands - Poll for commands
- GET /api/canvas/status - Check canvas status

Canvas updates:
- App.tsx polls for commands from Claude Code
- Executes add-node, add-connection, clear commands
- Visual animation as nodes appear in real-time

New script:
- canvas_client.py - Python client for canvas API
- Pre-built B2B and Influencer workflow templates
- Custom workflow creation support

Workflow skill updates:
- /workflow create now builds visually in canvas
- Documentation for canvas API integration

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
